DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter, 6 months open label safety extension study for all patients who are willing and eligible to continue from the pivotal, double-blind S308.3.001 trial
DOC.brief_title: An Open Label SLV308 Safety Extension to Study S308.3.001 in Early PD Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients who have completed S308.3.001 trial Patients with medically relevant abnormal findings (ECG, physical examination, AEs) at end of the maintenance phase (visit M6, week 24) of study S308.3.001
